overview_summary: All three profiled neighbors have no documented stance for or against development, with each noted stance classified as unknown. None of these landowners holds a high-influence position in the community; they appear to be private residents without public leadership roles.

neighbors.name: James K. Conn and Danielle Messinger
neighbors.claims: James K. Conn and Danielle Messinger are listed as co-owners of a residential parcel in Roxana, Illinois (Madison County PIN 19-2-08-34-08-206-016) ([publicrecords.netronline.com](https://publicrecords.netronline.com/state/IL/county/madison#:~:text=Madison%20Assessor)). No available record in local news or meeting minutes shows Conn or Messinger taking public positions on development issues as of Dec 2025 ([www.thetelegraph.com](https://www.thetelegraph.com/news/article/South-Roxana-residents-voice-drainage-concerns-at-12712536.php#:~:text=EDWARDSVILLE%20%E2%80%94%20Two%20South%20Roxana,any%20money%20available%20for%20projects)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Use a friendly, personal outreach to introduce the project and address any basic property or neighborhood concerns. Emphasize listening and transparency to build trust.

neighbors.name: Damon Vest and Linda Vest
neighbors.claims: Damon Vest and his wife Linda Vest are identified as owners of a property in the village of Roxana, Madison County ([publicrecords.netronline.com](https://publicrecords.netronline.com/state/IL/county/madison#:~:text=Madison%20Assessor)). neighbors.claims: County property records list Camilla Gordon as the owner of a parcel in Roxana, IL ([publicrecords.netronline.com](https://publicrecords.netronline.com/state/IL/county/madison#:~:text=Madison%20Assessor)).
